price: It is from Solomon, and it reads, ‘In the name of Allah, the Most Compassionate, the Most Merciful.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
